revision.text:
In '''Shops''', various currencies can be exchanged for useful items such as [[Evolution Items]], [[Eggs]], and [[Pokéballs]].

The prices shown in the tables below reflect the base prices of each item. When bought in bulk, items increase in price by various amounts. With the exception of [[File:Masterball.png|25px]][[Masterball|Masterballs]] and [[File:Protein_Item.png|25px]][[Protein]], the price of shop items can be decreased back to their base price by defeating Pokémon on routes, [[Gyms]], and [[Dungeons]]. [[Key Items]], [[Oak Item|Oak Items]], and [[Farm Hand|Farm Hands]] are bolded and can only be bought once. ==[[Kanto]]: Locations & Items== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! City Name !! Item 1 !!  {{Questpoints}} 1,000 || - || - || - || - || - |- |} ==Poké Mart== A Department Store can be found in every region and are located in [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Celadon City]], [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Goldenrod City]], [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|LilyCove City]], [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Veilstone City]], [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Shopping Mall Nine]], and [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Lumiose City]]. *The [[Shops#Kanto:_Locations_and_items|Celadon City]] Department Store does not stock [[File:Ultraball.png|25px]][[Ultraball|Ultraballs]], [[File:SmallRestore.png|25px]][[Small Restore|Small Restores]], [[File:MediumRestore.png|25px]][[Medium Restore|Medium Restores]], or [[File:LargeRestore.png|25px]][[Large Restore|Large Restores]] *The [[Shops#Johto:_Locations_and_items|Goldenrod City]] Department Store also does not stock [[File:LargeRestore.png|25px]][[Large Restore|Large Restores]].
The Department Store with its complete inventory can be accessed in the Shortcuts module, alongside the [[File:Underground.png|20px]] [[Underground]] and [[File:Farm.png|20px]] [[Farm]], after defeating [[Gyms#Johto Indigo Plateau|Champion Lance]] in Johto. {| class="wikitable" |- | [[File:Ball_Pokeball.png|30px]][[Pokeball|Pokéball]]
 {{pdollar}} 100 || [[File:Greatball.png|30px]][[Greatball]]
 {{pdollar}} 500 || [[File:Ultraball.png|30px]][[Ultraball]]
 {{pdollar}} 2,000 || [[File:Bag_X_Attack_Sprite.png|30px]][[xAttack]]
 {{pdollar}} 600 |- | [[File:Bag_X_Click_Sprite.png|30px]][[xClick]]
 {{pdollar}} 400 || [[File:Bag_Lucky_Egg_Sprite.png|30px]][[Lucky Egg]]
 {{pdollar}} 800 || [[File:Bag_Token_Collector_Sprite.png|30px]][[Token Collector]]
 {{pdollar}} 1,000 ||[[File:Bag_Item_Magnet_Sprite.png|30px]][[Item Magnet]]
 {{pdollar}} 1,500 |- | [[File:Bag_Lucky_Incense_Sprite.png|30px]][[Lucky Incense]]
 {{pdollar}} 2,000 || [[File:SmallRestore.png|30px]][[Small Restore]]
 {{pdollar}} 30,000 || [[File:MediumRestore.png|30px]][[Medium Restore]]
 {{pdollar}} 100,000 || [[File:LargeRestore.png|30px]][[Large Restore]]
 {{pdollar}} 400,000 |} ===Pokémon League=== The Pokémon League Poké Mart is the same across all regions and sells [[File:Masterball.png|25px]][[Masterball|Masterballs]] and [[File:Protein_Item.png|25px]][[Protein]], which permanently increase in price upon purchase per currency. The base prices of these items are listed below. {| class="wikitable" |- | [[File:Masterball.png|30px]][[Masterball]]
 {{pdollar}} 10,000,000 || [[File:Masterball.png|30px]][[Masterball]]
 {{Dungeontokens}} 75,000 || [[File:Masterball.png|30px]][[Masterball]]
 {{Questpoints}} 3,000 || [[File:Masterball.png|30px]][[Masterball]]
 {{Farmpoints}} 3,000 || [[File:Masterball.png|30px]][[Masterball]]
 {{Diamonds}} 50 || [[File:Protein_Item.png|30px]][[Protein]]
 {{pdollar}} 10,000 |- |} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Evolution Items]]

In '''Shops''', various currencies can be exchanged for useful items such as [[Evolution Items]], [[Eggs]], and [[Pokéballs]].

The prices shown in the tables below reflect the base prices of each item. When bought in bulk, items increase in price by various amounts. With the exception of [[File:Masterball.png|25px]][[Masterball|Masterballs]] and [[File:Protein_Item.png|25px]][[Protein]], the price of shop items can be decreased back to their base price by defeating Pokémon on routes, [[Gyms]], and [[Dungeons]]. [[Key Items]], [[Oak Item|Oak Items]], and [[Farm Hand|Farm Hands]] are bolded and can only be bought once. ==[[Kanto]]: Locations and Items== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! City Name !!  {{Questpoints}} 1,000 || - || - || - || - || - |- |} ==Poké Mart== A Department Store can be found in every region and are located in [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Celadon City]], [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Goldenrod City]], [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|LilyCove City]], [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Veilstone City]], [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Shopping Mall Nine]], and [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Lumiose City]]. *The [[Shops#Kanto:_Locations_and_items|Celadon City]] Department Store does not stock [[File:Ultraball.png|25px]][[Ultraball|Ultraballs]], [[File:SmallRestore.png|25px]][[Small Restore|Small Restores]], [[File:MediumRestore.png|25px]][[Medium Restore|Medium Restores]], or [[File:LargeRestore.png|25px]][[Large Restore|Large Restores]] *The [[Shops#Johto:_Locations_and_items|Goldenrod City]] Department Store also does not stock [[File:LargeRestore.png|25px]][[Large Restore|Large Restores]].
The Department Store with its complete inventory can be accessed in the Shortcuts module, alongside the [[File:Underground.png|20px]] [[Underground]] and [[File:Farm.png|20px]] [[Farm]], after defeating [[Gyms#Johto Indigo Plateau|Champion Lance]] in Johto. {| class="wikitable" |- | [[File:Ball_Pokeball.png|30px]][[Pokeball|Pokéball]]
 {{pdollar}} 100 || [[File:Greatball.png|30px]][[Greatball]]
 {{pdollar}} 500 || [[File:Ultraball.png|30px]][[Ultraball]]
 {{pdollar}} 2,000 || [[File:Bag_X_Attack_Sprite.png|30px]][[xAttack]]

 {{pdollar}} 400 || [[File:Bag_Lucky_Egg_Sprite.png|30px]][[Lucky Egg]]

 {{pdollar}} 400,000 |} ===Pokémon League=== The Pokémon League Poké Mart is the same across all regions and sells [[File:Masterball.png|25px]][[Masterball|Masterballs]] and [[File:Protein_Item.png|25px]][[Protein]], which permanently increase in price upon purchase per currency. The base prices of these items are listed below. {| class="wikitable" |- | [[File:Masterball.png|30px]][[Masterball]]
